mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "Powder Your Face with Sunshine", "Two Faced Line", and "The Danville Star" ROUND DANCES "Calico Melody" and "Moonbeam Waltz" SPECIAL FEATURES "Exhibition Dancing", "Style Series (Promenade "Interruptions")", and "Calico-Jeans Jamboree". This edition also includes the the regular features entitled "As I see it", "Women on the Square" "Square Dance Picture", "The Square of the Month", "Round the Outside Ring", "From the Floor" and "Calendar of Square Dancing Events".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
